name: AuraCharge
description:
With AuraCharge™ you can trasform your device in a charger for your energy. Shout to collect Aura Points and try to be the strongest warrior.
Many characters, bizzarre location. Lots of fun!

How to Play
AuraCharge™ is simple but fun. You have to scream to the microphone of your device at the correct volume. By doing this, your character will get angry and he will start to transform himself like they do in those cool japanese animes! The objective is to be get all the transformations for your characters and to be the strongest warrior of the leader board!

(no copyright infringement intended)
